summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.0°C) and outside temperature (down 2.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 705 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1406 m), feels like temperature (up 6.0°C), outside temperature (up 4.2°C), and inside temperature (up 1.5°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 705.4m lower than yesterday, 542.6m lower than the past week, 1405.6m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1281.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, humidity should not be a concern. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
